steps.name: When  I Call Covered Call Strategy API With BestLimitPrice Price Type , BestLimit Symbol Basis And With Commission

Sending GET request with commission = true to: https://kahkeshanapi.ramandtech.com/Strategies/v1/CoveredCall?PageSize=100&PageNumber=1&PriceType=BestLimitPrice&SymbolBasis=BestLimit&WithCommission=true
Then  The Covered Call Strategy BEP Of جهش With Commission Is Valid
